body.p:
Mayfield Ky Feby 20"/61
To his Excellency
Beriah Magoffin
Respected sir

At the present Term of the Graves Equity & criminal Court there was a Judgment rendered in favor of the Comlth to Major W M Cargill & Wiley Morris for one hundred Dollars as securities on the bond of H W Boyd for Breach of the peace Boyd left the Country that is moved off, and as the offense was not a very henious one and as it would be a hardship on the securities to pay the Judgment These hard times. It would in my Judgment be right to release them, They therefore ask your Excellency through me to release them

Your obedient servant and friend
Thos H Corbett
